verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise The Lord all you nations
Praise Him all you people
for His Lovingkindness is great to us
His truth is everlasting

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Praise The Lord, Hallelujah ! (x3)
Praised be The Lord !

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hallelu et Adonai kol goyim
Shabechu Hu kol ha'mim
ki gavar aleinu chasdo
v'emet Adonai l'olam
